answers.answer: They tested you early, they normally don't do it till around 30 wks

Hi I actually have type 1 diabetes and 13 Weeks pregnant, honestly do not worry, they will explain. Everything to you. I've had it 15 years. One thing I will say is they take really good care of you in th diabetes department when you're pregnant.
I got that test done at 12 weeks they decided to do it earlier bc diabetes runs on both sides of my family.
I had gestational diabetes during my last pregnancy.   I never had to take insulin.   It was totally controlled by diet.  I hope you can do the same... and 160 really isn't all that high.

question: So today I got tested for gestational diabetes(which was hell) and my blood sugar was 160 and it should be under 140 and I am so scared... Im only 12 weeks pregnant...
title: gestational diabetes
